summary: Use this API to get Shop level CPC ads multiple-days daily performance
description: Use this API to get Shop level CPC ads multiple-days daily performance.

query.name: reference_id
query.description: A random string used to prevent duplicate ads. If an ads is created successfully, subsequent request using the same reference id will fail

query.name: budget
query.description: The budget set for the Auto Product Ads

query.name: start_date
query.description: the start date per campaign. please kindly note that if you want to set unlimited date, you can just pass today's date as the start date

query.name: end_date
query.description: the end date of each campaign. please kindly note that if you want to set an unlimited campaign, you can keep empty for the end date field

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.test.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ads/create_auto_product_ads?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "budget": 10.5,
    "end_date": "-",
    "reference_id": "asdf-1234-qwerty",
    "start_date": "11-11-2023"
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

import requests
import json

url = "https://partner.test.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ads/create_auto_product_ads?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "budget": 10.5,
  "end_date": "-",
  "reference_id": "asdf-1234-qwerty",
  "start_date": "11-11-2023"
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.RPCRequest("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)

schema.name: error
schema.description: Error code, empty when no error returned

schema.name: warning
schema.description: If some data cannot respond normally, set the warning

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: request id is unique for each request

schema.name: campaign_id
schema.description: The unique identifier for a campaign
